header.rec_loc: Campervan journey – a short drive to a friend’s house in Tarnow, Poland.
header.activity: Two friends discussing travel arrangements while driving the short distance to another friend’s house in Tarnow, Poland.

speaker.occupation: unemployed/ Some part-time private TEFL teacher/ Semi-retired
Teacher of English as a foreign Language
